recommendations.nutritional_support: High-protein diet to support wound healing and maintain albumin levels. Consider oral nutritional supplements if dietary intake is insufficient.
recommendations.early_mobilization: Encourage early ambulation and breathing exercises to prevent complications such as DVT, atelectasis, and pneumonia. Use incentive spirometry to improve lung function.
recommendations.follow_up: Schedule follow-up appointments at 2 weeks, 1 month, and 3 months post-surgery. Include chest imaging (CT scan) at 3 months to monitor for recurrence or complications.
